name: codegen
description: A macro tool to generate haxe and none-haxe codes from existing haxe source codes.
releasenote:
Emit protected fields in externs.
Fix subtype references in extends and implements.
Ignore private members by default (option `includePrivate`).
Add ability to generate @:jsRequire meta.
New optional API.
Apply mapping to types itself.
Remove @:build for haxe extern.
Include/exclude: support several packages in argument.
Backed out changeset: de812c12003f
Typescript: fix "declare module" to "export namespace".
